recipesJson.name: Red Robin - Poppin Purple Lemonade
recipesJson.author: Mawnstar
recipesJson.description: Poppin Purple Lemonade is a delicious prickly pear lemonade drink from Red Robin.

reviews.text: Very nice refreshing and simple recipe!  The cactus and PL compliment each other nicely.  I think this would be even more amazing with some coolant added as well...  Well done!  Btw, I did use ECX sweetener instead of Cap SS.
